ProductInfo.Features:

<11> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <12> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <13> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <14> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3 Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens with 55-250mm IS Lens + 64GB Card + Battery + Charger + Case + Filters + Tripod + Telephoto & Wide-Angle Lenses + Accessory Kit
